Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Bowl, made from a polished red clay, with a ring base foot. A carinated vase. Two lines are incised at 5,5 cm from the bottom. A decorative pattern of three vertical lines and ten horizontal ones painted in white is repeated three time.
